Text: RE New booking request for Dasovich JeffJeff Yes I did book UA and UA Also the enron rate at the W hotel is and the largest bed they have is Queen Will that be okay cynthia From SMTP Sent Monday July PM To Cc Subject RE New booking request for Dasovich Jeff Thanks Cynthia Could you please try the W since I know that one and let me know as soon as possible Greatly appreciated And Ill go ahead on the frequent flyer miles Im assuming that the ticket you booked for me is the one that leaves SF on at AM and returns from NYC on at EDT Thanks again Best Jeff Joseph Alamo To Jeff DasovichNAEnron cc PM Subject RE New booking request for Dasovich Jeff Jeff please read carefully from our travel agent in Houston Forwarded by Joseph AlamoNAEnron on PM Cynthia Biggs on PM To cc Subject RE New booking request for Dasovich Jeff Hello there I have made reservations for Jeff If he is wanting to use frequent flyer mileage for the other ticket the number to call is then press I made those kind of reservations one time and the airline agent screwed them all up and ended up being the biggest headache for me so I dont touch them any more Also the waldorf towers and waldorf astoria both are sold out for those days Does he have a couple of other choices Enrons preferred hotels are Drake Hilton and Towers Intercontinental Loews Metropolitan Millennium Broadway Millennium Hilton New York Palace Penninsula Plaza St Regis and W hotel Let me know if you want me to check any of those thanks cynthia From SMTP Sent Monday July PM To Cynthia Biggs Subject New booking request for Dasovich Jeff Please book for me Two bookings for Thursday August on UNITED departs SFO to JFK am and the return would be on Aug on UNITED departs JFK pm to SFO The name on the second booking would be Prentice Sellers Please use his United Mileage plus miles number is for hers Please also book them the Waldorf Towers East th Street NYC do we have a corp rate with them for three nights the usual King bed preferrednonsmoking room preferably Due to our recent email issue please call me as well as sending me the booking info via email sorry Im being converted to Outlook sometime this week so I may have more email issues again UGH Thanks a heap Joseph Alamo This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

review and approve jeff dasovich aug travel must ticket today for fare Cc CBCB BOOKING REF YTW DASOVICHJEFF ENRON CORP CALIFORNIA ST STE ENRON CORP SAN FRANCISCO CA MAIL ETKT RCPT DATE JUL SERVICE DATE FROM TO DEPART ARRIVE UNITED AIRLINES AUG SAN F CA NEW YORK NY A P UA B THU SAN FRANCISCO JOHN F KENNEDY NON SMOKING TERMINAL N TERMINAL BREAKFASTSNACK NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING ER SEAT E NO SMOKING CONFIRMED DASOVICHJEFFI AISLE SEAT CONFIRMED HOTEL AUG W HOTEL NEW YORK AUG LEXINGTON AVENUE NEW YORK NY UNITED STATES OF AMERICA TELEPHONE FAX TELEX NONE CONFIRMATION C REFERENCE CQENR DOUBLE ROOM QUEEN SIZE BED RATE ENR USD PER NIGHT GUARANTEE GIVEN ENRON RATE NON SMKNG TO AVOID BILLING CANCEL HRS PRIOR TO ARRIVAL UNITED AIRLINES AUG NEW YORK NY SAN F CA P P UA B SUN JOHN F KENNEDY SAN FRANCISCO NON SMOKING TERMINAL TERMINAL N DINNER NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING ER SEAT B NO SMOKING CONFIRMED DASOVICHJEFFI AISLE SEAT CONFIRMED MISCELLANEOUS DEC HOUSTON TX MON THANK YOU FOR USING THE TAP RESERVATION NUMBERS UALMFO DASOVICHJEFF SCR UA FREQUENT FLYER UA INTL TVLRS CARRY SOS WALLET CARD WENRON ASSISTANCE INFO CALL SOS MEDICAL EMERGENCYIN US CALL SOS MEDICAL EMERGENCYINTL COLLECT HADV THE AIRLINE OF YOUR FREQUENT FLYER NUMBER THIS IS THE PASSENGER RECEIPT FOR YOUR ELECTRONIC TICKET PLEASE CHECKIN WITH PHOTO IDENTIFICATION AND WITH EITHER THIS RECEIPT OR YOUR CONFIRMATION NUMBER YOUR ETKT CONFIRMATION NUMBER IS LMFO TICKET PRICE IS ROUNDTRIP REFUNDABLE THIS IS AN ADVANCE PURCHASE FARE THAT REQUIRES TRAVEL ON THESE SPECIFIC DATES AND FLIGHTS CHANGES ARE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY AND REQUIRE AT LEAST DAYS ADVANCE NOTICE ALL FARES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE UNTIL TICKETEDPURCHASED

RE New booking request for Dasovich JeffJeff Actually that is better than any rate I get I show United American and Continental at and America West at If you can get that is pretty good Thanks cynthia From SMTP Sent Tuesday July PM To Cynthia Biggs Subject RE New booking request for Dasovich Jeff Hi Me again Thanks for all the help with the New York trip I have another question My family four people is going to Boston on September returning to SF on September I noticed on Uniteds website that they have round trip for about and I was wondering if you folks can better that Best Jeff Cynthia Biggs cynthia rave To lparkcom cc PM Subject RE New booking request for Dasovich Jeff I am going to email the itinerary to you now It will have all the information on it cynthia From SMTP Sent Monday July PM To Cynthia Biggs Subject RE New booking request for Dasovich Jeff Dandy Thanks so much Whats the address of the W Best Jeff This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE Car ReservationNonPrivilegedpst Hi Jeff I just got in and I will set it up for you and email an itinerary to you thanks cynthia Original Message From Dasovich Jeff mailtoJeff NRONcom Sent Monday October PM To Cynthia Biggs Subject Car Reservation Hi Cynthia Im not sure if Im going about this correctly but Josephs out today so I thought Id give it a shot I need to rent a car tomorrow Tuesday Oct pick up at AM and return it on Wed Oct at AM want to rent from the Hertz outlet on Mason Street in SF which is where I always rent Is this something that you folks generally arrange or do I just do it Is there a corporate account Ill need if I do it Really appreciate your help Best Jeff This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
